title: Start Here
description: Welcome to Backlogged - the game for developers. Click the Get Started button to start your journey as a developer!

title: Simple Trivia
description: okay, so you know your math. How about some trivia? How many moons does Earth have?

title: Add a splash of colour
description: Still here eh? I appreciate the didication! Now it's time to get to work. The site could use a little colour. Just don't go overboard. What does the G in RGB stand for?
